meanings.sent1: She studied hard lest she fail the exam.
meanings.sent2: He double-checked his work lest there be any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: She brought an umbrella lest it suddenly rains.
meanings.sent4: He always carries a flashlight lest he get lost in the dark.
meanings.sent5: They whispered in the library lest they disturb others.

meanings.sent1: He left early lest he miss the bus.
meanings.sent2: She wore sunscreen lest she get sunburned.
meanings.sent3: He packed snacks lest he get hungry during the trip.
meanings.sent4: She locked the door lest someone enter without permission.
meanings.sent5: They set reminders lest they forget important tasks.

meanings.sent1: She covered the food lest it spoil.
meanings.sent2: He spoke softly lest he wake the baby.
meanings.sent3: She saved money lest she run out of it later.
meanings.sent4: He took a different route lest he encounter traffic.
meanings.sent5: They arrived early lest they miss the beginning of the show.

meanings.sent1: She packed an extra sweater lest it gets cold.
meanings.sent2: He brought a map lest he gets lost.
meanings.sent3: She carried an umbrella lest it rains unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: He kept a first aid kit lest someone gets injured.
meanings.sent5: They brought snacks lest they get hungry during the journey.

meanings.sent1: She left a note lest he forget the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He set an alarm lest he oversleep.
meanings.sent3: She closed the windows lest bugs come in.
meanings.sent4: He turned off the lights lest he waste electricity.
meanings.sent5: They finished their work early lest they miss the deadline.
